text:
"DISCLAIMER: DailyPostFeed.com is a satirical publication that may sometimes appear to be telling the truth. We assure you that’s not the case. We present fiction as fact and our sources don’t actually exist. Names that represent actual people and places are purely coincidental and all images should be considered altered and do not in any way depict reality. All people, places, names, and images should be considered fictitious or fictitious representations."

Oh my, did you really post this, without giving the first glance at your source....From YOUR source ops....Read it for yourself: DISCLAIMER – DAILY POST FEED



Oh wait, they are just like Ops, who also presents fiction as fact...... Oh wait, they are just like Ops, who also presents fiction as fact......



Come on ops, are you this desperate? Do you realize that no one takes you seriously anymore. Come on ops, are you this desperate? Do you realize that no one takes you seriously anymore.



And where the hell is Hillary? And where the hell is Hillary?

Considering all of the news that's coming out demonstrating all of the sexual accusations that show how the congressmen in Washington conduct themselves, do you really feel that something like this about Schumer couldn't be correct? I admit, I've jumped the gun on some posts and posted items that are questionable, but on my behalf I don't purposely do it out of spite, there does that make you happy.
